title: When the Broken Saintess Touches Love
After breaking up, I had relationship with my ex’s uncle-in-law
summary:
Sylvia's past life had been marked by sacrifice and betrayal. To marry her boyfriend, she had taken the fall and served a prison sentence, only to have her boyfriend and her sister cruelly betray her upon her release. But just as Sylvia's life hung by a thread, an unexpected chance at redemption arose. She was saved from the brink by Tristan, her ex's uncle, who saw an opportunity to help Sylvia be reborn into a new life.

title: Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is A Little Sweet
summary: “How perverted is Si Ye Han’s taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.

title: Demonic Evolution
summary: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: I Became a Civil Servant in a Magical World
summary:
"Monday? Hate it. Tuesday? Hate it. And what I hate the most? Going to work."
The civil servant Hae Sunal feels this way. In his previous life, all he wished for was to be able to use magic as normally as anyone else, so he invented a way for it to happen… In his next life. But now that he's in this new life, due to ‘magic’, he’s been living a far noisier life than expected.
“Hello, I am Hae Sunal, a member of the Special Department for Cross-Species Civil Complaints and Resolution.”

title: Traces of the Moon
summary:
While on his way home from an interview, unemployed, unmotivated, jaded 18-year-old Inumata Shinogi encounters the beautiful lady and evil spirit Yaergnacht Finsternis. She demands him to either marry her or die on the spot. He must command the battle against enemies of humanity, the apostles of God (Highlanders), and save the world with his wife!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912965944469925)

title: Underground of Babel (Official)
summary: Though she's a tomboy with a hangup over her tiny chest, Iori has a crush on Sota Seto, who is the pastry chef at the café where she works. Iori was sure that he wasn't interested in her until one day, he suddenly professes his love for her and goes on to kiss her. She sees him unclothed for the first time - and my, he's huge!! She never would have expected the graceful man's lips to be caressing her all over. It's terribly embarrassing, but she discovers that his you-know-what isn't gross at all…

title: Seduce Her
summary: Harold is the descendant of the hero who defeated the evil demon king. In this peaceful era, Harold has become a convenient handyman for the townsfolk. One day, a sacred book predicting the world's destruction is discovered. The condition to avert this catastrophe is... "you must complete the 'Newlyweds Quest' with the demon king's daughter." Thus begins Harold's unexpected married life with Yona, the demon king's daughter. While Harold still feels bewildered by all this, not only can Yona perfectly handle the household chores, she sweetly pampers him when he's tired. However, she harbors a secret...

title: Happy Sea World
summary:
Lowell, the "ugly duckling" of the Viscounts of Linthea, is sold in marriage to the Dukes of Hikaruel, a vampire.

Rumors that her political partner, the Duke of Hikaruel, has burn scars all over his body and is crippled, etc., lead her to Hikaruel territory, where she is unable to hide her fears.
But what awaits Roel in the Duchy of Hikaruel is Prince Aslan, a beautiful dark-haired boy, and the kind people of the Duchy of Hikaruel...!

Having grown up in an abusive family, Lowell is bewildered by the Prince's different appearance and the warm atmosphere of the ducal family, but he also feels happy.

"Please, let me stay here forever...!"

Unhappy Lowell's life as the happiest bride in the world begins!

title: I Got Married to a Duke Called Beast
summary:
The Duke of Statern, with his vast estate and immense wealth, proposed to me.
Why did he proposed me? I’m from a noble family that had no fiefdom and only is only a noble in name.
There was a even horrible rumor coming from the capital…

title: The Nerd Turned Out to Be the Tyrant
summary: Lin Lei transmigrated into her favorite character, Grace Gottlieb, from a sadistic novel she'd read. Grace met her end by the blade of her bloodthirsty tyrant husband, Charles Mountbatten Albert. Shockingly, Grace is currently five years old, making the powerless Lin Lei desperate for a divorce from Charles!

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: One Night With Deep Passions
summary:
One drunken night led her into the wrong room—a room where she provoked a devil who could never be sated. When dawn broke, she fled in a panic. However, he continued to linger around her like a haunting shadow, overwhelming her with his flirtatious behavior.

He declared that the one night spent together meant that they must show endless devotion to each other for the rest of their lives. 

Every moment, thoughts of her consumed him, and the devil demanded she take responsibility.

title: The Villainess is Done Trying
summary: What would you do when you've transmigrated as the most-hated villainess in the story? In the case of Marso, she tried hard to change the storyline by performing good deeds and taking care of the female lead. However, things are not going as she had hoped for--every character in the story still hates her! It seems no matter what she does she cannot seem to change her fate. Tired of trying, Marso declares that she'll stay home and do nothing--for the rest of her life.

title: World’s Greatest Senior Disciple
summary:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

title: The Devil’s Body Temperature
summary:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

title: When Arrogance Fell at My Feet
After Refusing to Donate a Kidney, I Became My Ex’s Little Aunt
Spring Fever
summary: Yusuke Onishi easily gets crushes on everybody and anybody, but never succeeds in love. That is, until the day he meets and falls in love with his new neighbor – a mature single parent. Yusuke has finally met his match. But his match just happens to be a guy! This is a classic oyaji-uke of an unexpected love between two people; one younger, one older.

title: There is no mercy
summary:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.

title: Healing Touch
summary:
"Sunbae, what have you been up to these last few nights?"  
  
Taeyoung, who is living with his hobae(his buddy), Junghoon, has a problem.  
He relieves himself while thinking of Junghoon every night, but can't finish.  
But what is..?! While they're drinking together, Junghoon offers to lend his hand…!

title: Back from the Abyss: I Am the Disaster
summary: The Immortal Emperor family was wiped out overnight, and the young master Li Chen was thrown into the most mysterious and dangerous abyss! Eight years later, he broke out of the abyss, the empress in his left hand, and the gods and demons in his right hand, and everything he went was

title: Marriage Blues
summary: On her wedding day, Hana Gu realizes her relationship lacks love and flees the ceremony. During her escapade, she runs into her ex-boyfriend, Gawi Nam who helps her by using his mysterious ability to time travel into the past. Determined to erase her unwanted marriage, she uses this ability to try and change her fate, but the future proves less malleable than expected. Amid repeated failures, she finds solace in Gawi, who is also trapped in the past, facing similar struggles. As they fight fate together, old feelings from their first love resurface, making Hana question -- does she truly want to change her fate?

title: Loving Summer Sky
summary: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: The regressor only protects me
summary:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

title: In This Life, I’m Resigning From Being a Villain Queen
summary: "Congratulations, host, for completing the ultimate mission to kill the Bloody Queen, Reina. Guard leader Max's favorability has reached maximum, and your charm index has reached maximum..." Hearing this sudden electronic chime, I should be happy too. That is, if I'm not Reina. After death, Reina returns to five years ago, knowing that her loyal guard, gentle fiancé, and tsundere brother will all soon backstab her and fall under the host's spell. This time, Reina decides to just run away.

title: The Merman Trapped in My Lake
summary: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.

title: I Became the Rabbit Heroine’s Stepmother
summary: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won’t be easy, but she has help. The World Tree’s butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.

title: The Strongest Crystal Beast Master
summary: Young Chen Xing formed a bond with Lily, the “Fated Queen” of the Crystal Beast Realm, becoming the first awakener to contract with a humanoid crystal beast. He gained a special ability to turn crystal beasts into beautiful girls and set out on a journey of battle and power to become the “Strongest Crystal Beast Master.” Jealous? I’ve got countless humanoid crystal beast girls like her!

title: Falling in Love Is Not as Good as the Boy Band, Crown
summary: Yun Shang was reborn— before her debut with the little brothers, who are idols part of the popular band Crown, she found out she was reborn in the body of the “Vicious Female supporting actress” all the guys in Crown hated; Lu YoYo. The little cuties who believed they were helpless, pitiful, and weak, were big bosses who stabbed people's hearts. To change this tragic fate of herself and the idols, Lu YoYo, clutching into her deteriorating heart, raised her flag and decided to change the fate of these idols.

title: Pretty Woman
summary:
At her brother Touma's wedding, Fuyuka Nishi falls in love with Akito, a handsome young man who is just her type. In order to win Akito's favor, Fuyuka tries to get some information on him from her brother, but Touma, who knows about Akito's bad reputation, is in denial and tries hard to undermine Fuyuka's infatuation towards Akito. He accidentally says the following: "Although Akito pretends to be tough, he is actually the type of guy who wants to be dominated by women without any limitations" (a lie). Without knowing it, Akito goes to the aquarium with Fuyuka for a date -...?

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

title: Player Super Justice
summary: Annan, a senior game producer, traveled to the foggy continent of another world and became a rare elite NPC with a player system. But he still has a heart that belongs to a player. Although I love to stir up trouble and act recklessly, I am a good player and a righteous partner favored by this world. Now I am carrying the main quest, as a righteous player, I am ordered by heaven to eliminate you, the evil NPC!

title: My Fake Love
summary: Megumi, a 32-year-old surgeon, navigates heartbreak, unexpected romance, and personal growth. After her boyfriend of seven years, abruptly ends their relationship, Megumi's world crumbles. Even worse, she gets invited to his engagement party. To avoid embarrassment, Megumi enlists the help of her junior colleague, Dr. Akiho, to pose as her boyfriend. Akiho agrees, but his motivations are not entirely altruistic. As they continue the charade, genuine feelings begin to surface between Megumi and Akiho. Their budding relationship faces numerous obstacles, including Akiho's arranged engagement to his childhood friend, Marika, and familial pressures. Megumi also confronts her own insecurities and past traumas, particularly concerning marriage and family. Throughout the series, Megumi and Akiho support each other through personal and professional challenges, gradually building a deep and authentic connection. The story culminates in a heartfelt conclusion where they confront their fears and embrace a future together.

title: The Villainous Emperor and the Beloved Family Plan
The Hated Noble Lady, Yet in a Contract Marriage with the First Prince?!
Battle of Mosol
summary: Win love! Win 500 million won! A competition begins where three single women in their thirties put 500 million won on the line to break free from being single. A princess without her prince, Gong Jurim, a trash collector, Kang Seon, and a firm believer in premarital purity, Kim Chaeyul! Who will be the ultimate winner of this singles showdown?

title: The Extra Guardian Missed the Right Time to Leave
I Became The King by Scavenging
summary:
Mars, a 12-year-old prince, is terrified of being assassinated. His meals are constantly being poisoned, so he lives on monster meat. Then one night, a beautiful red-haired woman appears and says to him, “You have potential. Become my apprentice.”. From a single misunderstanding, the boy becomes the most powerful king (even though he doesn't want to)!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiba](https://mangadex.org/author/a85a847d-d2d4-4a34-aea0-edcf7a56e8e9)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/mon29_4ryo)

title: The Final-Boss Prince is Somehow Obsessed with the Chubby Villainess: Reincarnated Me
summary:
After dying of illness, she has been reincarnated as Celine, the selfish, fat, villainous duchess, sister of the heroine of a popular novel.
If she stays this way, she will be killed by the hero prince and die a miserable death, just as in the novel. She vows to reform herself with all her might and begins to struggle, but she finds herself caught up in unexpected doting and obsession..!
Will Celine be able to find "peaceful happiness"?

A fantasy love story about a reincarnation in another world where she is loved too much by a Yandere.

title: The Obsessive Male Lead Made Me The Female Lead
summary:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

title: I Became the Cure for the Tyrant in the Waste Novel
summary: I transmigrated into an explicit 19+ novel as the villain. And it happened to be at the moment when I was about to take over the Emperor on the bed. Until then, I thought I had died without moving a muscle. Enoch Philip de Harte was a tyrant who hated any contact with others. But he insists that I am the cure to melt the ice in his heart and follows me around…
